hadiths.text: It was narrated that Kab bin Ujrah said:"I entered Ihram, then I had a severe infestation of head lice. News of that reached Prophet, and he came to me when I was cooking something in a pot for my companions, he touched my head with his finger and said: 'Go and shave it, and give charity to six poor persions

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الْمُحْرِمِ يُؤْذِيهِ الْقَمْلُ فِي رَأْسِهِ .
chapter.eng-name: Concerning A Muhrim Who Has An Infestation Of Head Lice
